page.title: 01Kensworth & Whipsnade
page.content: Altitude 600-700ft. above sea level Situation Edge of Chiltern Hills Landscape Undulating,mainly rural Soil Varies from chalk to clay Population Kensworth approx 3000 Whipsnade " 600 Climate colder than lower areas,more snow in winter Recreation Tree Cathedral,Zoo,Clubs Woodlands oak,beech, some managed conifers Wildlife mammals foxes,deer,moles, shrew,mice etc. Bird Life common garden & field eg. skylark,crows,sparrows etc. Wild Flowers Abundant-some specific to chalkland Hedgerows numerous consisting hazel, blackthorn,blackberry. Tourism Whipsnade Zoo. Kensworth village ribbon development Whipsnade very small village
